Articles.Content: Hey guys! I'm sorry in advance because this has been asked a 1000 times but I can not get this mod to install! I have the newest update of the game and the mod and the instructions just say to slap it in the Game Data folder which I did (Right next to the Squad folder) and nothing  In the KSPedia all the BD stuff pops up so the game reads a little bit of the mod but no parts come up. Not sure what I am missing...

10 hours ago, Jack118711 said:

Hey guys! I'm sorry in advance because this has been asked a 1000 times but I can not get this mod to install! I have the newest update of the game and the mod and the instructions just say to slap it in the Game Data folder which I did (Right next to the Squad folder) and nothing  In the KSPedia all the BD stuff pops up so the game reads a little bit of the mod but no parts come up. Not sure what I am missing... 

I suspect you have either not installed the correct version of BDAc for you KSP version or you have put the source code download into your gamedata

Please read the OP of our thread where there is a detailed description on how to install BDAc ... for convenience I am posting the pertinent part here:

Quote

Also, to correctly install BDAc, first download the latest release (not the source download) and then extract the BDArmory folder contained within the zip file and place it into your KSP/Gamedata folder ... Do not, I repeat, do not place the Gamedata folder contained within the BDAc zip into your Gamedata folder as this will cause umpteen million conflicts to arise as the BahaTurret pickle looks for textures, configs and whatnot in specific places
